headline.main: M'CAIN IS DECORATED FOR WORK IN PACIFIC; Admiral Wins D.S.M. for Work in Solomons -- 2 Fliers Honored

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Oct. 31 (AP) -- Rear Admiral John Sidney McCain, 58 years of age, chief of the Navy's Bureau of Aeronautics, received the Distinguished Service Medal today for "exceptionally meritorious service" in the South Pacific and in the Solomons campaign.
abstract: DSM awarded to Rear Adm J S McCain, Silver Star to 2
